title: Sovereign Capsule WebBuilder
summary: Bootstrapping the capsule runtime with live manifest generation and sovereign deployment hooks.
body: The Sovereign Capsule WebBuilder turns each .aoscap file into a live, license-aware runtime page.
Every capsule compiles with DriftLock + VaultChain metadata so deployment hooks can verify state in real time.
Expand this capsule body to include launch notes, Viewer+ embeds, and licensing protocol checkpoints.
